sent.orig: When we use "he", we generalize for both sex.
sent.trans: 当我们用he时，我们泛指男女。

sent.orig: The levels of ATP and 2 3-DPG in patients complicated with hepatic encephalopathy (HE) decreased evidently.
sent.trans: 并发肝性脑病 (HE)时PaO2 明显降低 ，ATP及 2 3-DPG含量明显减少。

sent.orig: HE stain, toluidine blue Dyeing and immunohistochemistry test were performed to observe the histomorphology.
sent.trans: 行HE染色、甲苯胺蓝染色及免疫组化进行组织形态学观察。

sent.orig: Pathological changes were observed by HE, Congo red, and Ag staining.
sent.trans: 病理组织观察采用HE染色、刚果红染色和银染色。

sent.orig: Changes in capillary poured with Chinese ink were observed using HE staining.
sent.trans: HE染色观察采用墨汁灌注染色的大鼠前列腺微血管的改变。
